00030 void CsmaInternetNode::NotifyConstructionCompleted() {
00031         Base::NotifyConstructionCompleted();
00032         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 1);
00033         ns3::InternetStackHelper internet_stack_helper;
00034         internet_stack_helper.SetIpv4StackInstall(true);
00035         internet_stack_helper.SetIpv6StackInstall(false);
00036         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 1);
00037         this->logAllDevices();
00038         internet_stack_helper.Install(ns3::NodeContainer(this));
00039         NS_LOG_INFO("InternetStackHelper::Install finished");
00040         this->logAllDevices();
00041         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices() == 2);
00042         NS_ASSERT(this->GetDevice(1)->GetObject<ns3::LoopbackNetDevice>(ns3::LoopbackNetDevice::GetTypeId()));
00043 }
00044 
00045 ns3::Ipv4Address CsmaInternetNode::getCsmaNetDeviceAddress() {
00046         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices()==2);
00047         ns3::Ptr<ns3::Ipv4> ptr_ipv4 = this->GetObject<ns3::Ipv4> ();
00048         ns3::Ptr<ns3::CsmaNetDevice> ptr_csma_net_device = this->getCsmaNetDevice();
00049         const int i_interface =
00050                         ptr_ipv4->GetInterfaceForDevice(ptr_csma_net_device);
00051         ns3::Ipv4InterfaceAddress ipv4_interface_address = ptr_ipv4->GetAddress(
00052                         i_interface, 0);
00053         ns3::Ipv4Address ipv4_address = ipv4_interface_address.GetLocal();
00054         return ipv4_address;
00055 }//getCsmaNetDeviceAddress
00056 
00057 void CsmaInternetNode::assignAddress(
00058                 ns3::Ipv4AddressHelper& ipv4_address_helper) {
00059         NS_ASSERT(this->GetNDevices()==2);
00060         ipv4_address_helper.Assign(
00061                         ns3::NetDeviceContainer(this->getCsmaNetDevice()));
00062         //this->setRemote(this);
00063         NS_LOG_INFO(this->getCsmaNetDeviceAddress() << " node " << this->GetId());
00064 }
